com.aaronmreyes.scrabble.core.tiles

Class AbilityTile

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.aaronmreyes.scrabble.core.tiles.AbstractTile
      • com.aaronmreyes.scrabble.core.tiles.AbilityTile
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    DoubleLetter, DoubleWord, TripleLetter, TripleWord

    public abstract class AbilityTile
extends AbstractTile
    Class that contains the setup for any ability tile. Ability tiles are placed on the board and visible to all players during the game. Whenever an ability tile is used, then its ability is applied to the current move's score. You must assign each tile a priority. See Board#HIGH_PRIORITY and Board#LOW_PRIORITY for the default values. These tiles have no point value.
    Author:
    Aaron Reyes
